org.jetel.component.partition

Class DataPartitionFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.component.AbstractDataTransform
      • org.jetel.component.partition.DataPartitionFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PartitionFunction, Transform

    public abstract class DataPartitionFunction
extends AbstractDataTransform
implements PartitionFunction
    The base class for all partition functions.
    Since:
    7th January 2010

      • init

        protected void init()
             throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Override this method to provide user-desired initialization of this partition function. This method is called from the init(int numPartitions, RecordKey partitionKey) method.
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException - if the initialization fails for any reason
